title: Die Geschichte vom Astronauten
abstract: A ghost story of abandoned lovers and tangled paths in search of a new voice.

credits.1st: Written, directed and produced by Godehard Giese
credits.2nd: Montage by Trang Nguyen & Jules Hermann

awards.1st: Best Production Award, Achtung! berlin film festival 2014

title: t like a cross
abstract: Super 8 mm panoramic multichannel soundscape of weightless-experience, of detachment.

credits.1st: Concept, Sound & Mixing by Jana Irmert

festivals.1st: ENTER exhibition at Blockbuster Exhibitions, Berlin 2014
festivals.2nd: New York City Electroacoustic Music Festival 2013

title: finovo
abstract: "Fin" is the end and "novo" is a new beginning, a photofilm about a cemetery café in Berlin.

title: Nicht weit vor mir
abstract: What is a dream? What is reality? A lonely young lady stumbles upon a book about lucid dreaming.

credits.1st: Directed by Rüdiger Görlitz and Sanne Kurz

title: Redfern
abstract: Redfern portrays urban Aboriginal people in Sydney, Australia in photos and soundscape.

credits.1st: Directed, edited and produced by Trang Nguyen
credits.3rd: Photography by Tania Lambert & Krista Weber

festivals.1st: Rencontres Henri Langlois, section Docs d’Europe 2012

title: hanoi – transition
abstract: Streets of Hanoi, on the day of the three kitchen guardians brought inside out at a public square in Potsdam, Germany.

title: Tage des Regens
abstract: Days of Rain tells the story of a boy and his family in central Vietnam, taking up the challenge of building a new home.

credits.1st: Cinematography and Direction by Andreas Hartmann

festivals.3rd: Toronto Reel Asian Intl Film Festival 2010

title: Leerfahrt
abstract: An unemployed actor appears again and again in new roles as a ticket inspector in the subway.

credits.4th: Written by Matis Burkhardt & Dominik Bohn

festivals.3rd: Thai Short Film and Video Festival, 2010

title: Here be Dragons
abstract: Documentation of design and making of the two dragons dancing installation on the Perfume river for the Hue festival.

credits.3rd: Cinematography by Jennifer Jones, Phillip Nizette & Paul Zetter

awards.1st: Best Documentary FNI(A) Award, Film Networking Industry Australia 2007

title: moon
abstract: iPod, toilet paper cores, drinking straws, rice and cut paper figures. An old rat is taking a bride and moon tales of the buffalo boy under the banyan tree.

credits.1st: Concept and Realisation by Trang Nguyen
credits.3rd: Music by Pacha a Juskanic Slovenska Orkestra

title: lil'A
abstract: A 12 year-old boy who sets himself the goal to become the best dancer and the best choreographer in the world.

title: Mannequin
abstract: A mannequin's dream as the night falls. Composed on a flatbed Steenbeck from found footage.

credits.1st: Concept and Realisation by Trang Nguyen
credits.2nd: Found Footage from "Meine Frau macht Musik", Hans Heinrich, 1958

title: Lottoboy
abstract: Lottoboy follows a teenager selling lottery results on the streets of Hanoi.

credits.1st: Concept and Realisation by Trang Nguyen
